body: @ZiggyStardust The fuck you said about Tsundere Waifus huh? One of the best thing of Japanese 2D and you insult it? Bruh. | @BigNutBuss64 Basically her 2nd Sister, just like the MC wished for.
Louise with tits? I can’t believe I don’t like it. Small tits are part of Louise

The Familliar of Zero was my first REAL anime and it was fucking amazing. I say real because until about 6-7 years ago, the closest thing I’d watched was pretty much Pokémon and Yu-Gi-Oh.

Still fucking love Louise. FLAT IS JUSTICE. But this is an exception...
@Canned Soup yeah, she's not being an unrepentant cunt.
oppai is love, oppai is life! Pettanko sucks! Deal with it.
